chef_description: Award-winning chef with 20 years of experience.

recipe_info.cooking_method: 1. Cook spaghetti in boiling water. 2. Fry bacon. 3. Whisk eggs and cheese. 4. Mix everything together.
1. Sear beef. 2. Saute mushrooms and shallots. 3. Wrap beef in pastry. 4. Brush with egg wash. 5. Bake.
1. Marinate chicken in lemon juice, garlic, and rosemary. 2. Grill or pan-fry chicken. 3. Serve with lemon wedges.

chef_description: Michelin-starred chef with a passion for fusion cuisine.

recipe_info.cooking_method: 1. Cook sushi rice. 2. Lay nori flat. 3. Spread rice on nori. 4. Add tuna, avocado, and cucumber. 5. Roll up like a burrito.
1. Preheat oven. 2. Roll out pizza dough. 3. Spread tandoori chicken, onion, and bell pepper. 4. Top with cheese. 5. Bake.
1. Roast peppers. 2. Cook beef with tomatoes and onions. 3. Stuff peppers with beef and cheese. 4. Bake until cheese is melted.
1. Cook chicken. 2. Blend tomatillos, jalapenos, and onion. 3. Dip tortillas in sauce. 4. Add chicken and roll up. 5. Bake until golden.
1. Marinate pork with spices and pineapple. 2. Grill or roast pork. 3. Serve with onions, cilantro, and pineapple. 4. Wrap in tortillas.
1. Toast chiles and spices. 2. Blend with nuts and chocolate. 3. Cook chicken in sauce. 4. Serve with rice.

chef_description: Former pastry chef turned food blogger.

recipe_info.cooking_method: 1. Cream butter and sugars. 2. Beat in eggs. 3. Mix in flour and chocolate chips. 4. Bake at 375F for 10-12 minutes.
1. Mash bananas. 2. Mix in sugar, butter, and eggs. 3. Add flour and mix until just combined. 4. Bake at 350F for 50-60 minutes.
1. Mix flour, sugar, and butter. 2. Beat in milk and eggs. 3. Fold in blueberries. 4. Bake at 375F for 20-25 minutes.
1. Mix pumpkin puree, eggs, sugar, and spices. 2. Pour into pie crust. 3. Bake at 350F for 50-60 minutes.
1. Grate carrots. 2. Mix in flour, sugar, and eggs. 3. Beat in butter. 4. Bake at 350F for 30-40 minutes.

chef_description: Thai chef who specializes in seafood dishes. With a passion for seafood and the Mediterranean way of life, Chef Rossi's innovative dishes, inspired by the flavors of the sea, have won numerous awards and accolades over the years. His signature dishes include grilled octopus with lemon and herbs, spaghetti alle vongole, and branzino baked in sea salt.
